basic_information.scholarship_name: 2nd Lt. Jered Ewy Endowed Military Scholarship

description: To provide scholarships to a student currently serving in the military or previously enlisted and honorably or medically discharged. Eligibility Requirements: Must complete application and upload a transcript Minimum 2.75 GPA U.S. Citizen Student currently serving in the military or student previously enlisted and honorably or medically discharged This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
